trans-unit.source: Represents a collection of application-specific <see cref="T:System.IO.Packaging.Package" /> instances used in combination with <see cref="T:System.IO.Packaging.PackWebRequest" />.
trans-unit.target: Representa uma coleção de instâncias <see cref="T:System.IO.Packaging.Package" /> específicas de aplicativos usadas em combinação com <see cref="T:System.IO.Packaging.PackWebRequest" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageStore> defines a reference collections of package that are open and active in the application.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageStore> define uma coleção de referência do pacote está aberto e ativo no aplicativo.

trans-unit.source: Packages added to the <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageStore> are accessed is by their key URI value.
trans-unit.target: Pacotes adicionados para o <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageStore> são acessados é por seus valores URI de chave.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageStore> supports three common uses:
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageStore> oferece suporte a três usos comuns:

trans-unit.source: Accessing <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart> data through <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackWebRequest>.
trans-unit.target: Acessando <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart> dados por meio de <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackWebRequest>.

trans-unit.source: The application obtaining an instance of a <xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package> given the package's URI.
trans-unit.target: O aplicativo obter uma instância de um <xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package> fornecido URI do pacote.

trans-unit.source: Accessing packages that are created and stored in a <xref:System.IO.MemoryStream>.
trans-unit.target: Acessar pacotes que são criados e armazenados em um <xref:System.IO.MemoryStream>.

trans-unit.source: To improve performance and minimize the overhead of repeated file open/close operations, the <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageStore> is used to manage instances of packages accessed by <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackWebRequest> and directly by the application.
trans-unit.target: Para melhorar o desempenho e minimizar a sobrecarga de operações de abrir e fechar arquivo repetidas, o <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageStore> é usado para gerenciar instâncias de pacotes acessados por <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackWebRequest> e diretamente pelo aplicativo.

trans-unit.source: When accessing data in a package, the <xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package> address of a requested <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart> <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart.Uri%2A> is first checked to see if the package is already defined and open in the <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageStore>.
trans-unit.target: Ao acessar dados em um pacote, o <xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package> endereço de um solicitado <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart> <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart.Uri%2A> é verificado para ver se o pacote já está definido e aberto no <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageStore>.

trans-unit.source: If the package is defined as open in the <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageStore>, requested parts can be accessed directly without repeatedly opening and closing the package for each request.
trans-unit.target: Se o pacote é definida como aberta no <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageStore>, solicitado partes podem ser acessadas diretamente sem repetidamente abrir e fechar o pacote para cada solicitação.

trans-unit.source: If your application opens a package with <xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package.Open%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>, <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageStore.AddPackage%2A> can be called to add the package to the <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageStore>.
trans-unit.target: Se seu aplicativo abre um pacote com <xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package.Open%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>, <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageStore.AddPackage%2A> pode ser chamado para adicionar o pacote para o <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageStore>.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageStore.RemovePackage%2A> should later be called to remove the package from the <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageStore> prior to calling <xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package.Close%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageStore.RemovePackage%2A> mais tarde deve ser chamado para remover o pacote de <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageStore> antes de chamar <xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package.Close%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.

trans-unit.source: XPS packages opened with an <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument.%23ctor%2A> constructor are automatically added and removed from the <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageStore> when the document is created and disposed.
trans-unit.target: Pacotes XPS aberto com um <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument.%23ctor%2A> construtor são automaticamente adicionados e removidos do <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageStore> quando o documento é criado e descartado.

trans-unit.source: (You do not need to call <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageStore.AddPackage%2A> or <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageStore.RemovePackage%2A> separately for XPS packages opened with <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument.%23ctor%2A> constructors.)
trans-unit.target: (Você não precisa chamar <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageStore.AddPackage%2A> ou <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageStore.RemovePackage%2A> separadamente para pacotes XPS abertos com <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument.%23ctor%2A> construtores.)

trans-unit.source: The file I/O permissions of a package accessed through the <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageStore> remains the same as the I/O permissions set on the package when it is opened.
trans-unit.target: As permissões de arquivo e/s de um pacote acessados por meio de <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageStore> permanece o mesmo que as permissões de e/s definidos no pacote quando ele é aberto.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageStore> only provides references to the packages that have been added the store.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageStore> só fornece referências para os pacotes que foram adicionados a loja.

trans-unit.source: It is up to the application to correctly open, update, and close each package.
trans-unit.target: É responsabilidade do aplicativo para abrir, atualizar e fechar cada pacote corretamente.

trans-unit.source: Packages added to the <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageStore> can be accessed in multithreaded environments when they are used in combination with a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] parser such as <xref:System.Windows.Markup.XamlReader.Load%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: Pacotes adicionados para o <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageStore> podem ser acessados em ambientes multithread quando eles são usados em combinação com um [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] analisador como <xref:System.Windows.Markup.XamlReader.Load%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.

trans-unit.source: When operating in a multithreaded environment, the application must lock the package before access.
trans-unit.target: Ao operar em um ambiente multithreaded, o aplicativo deve bloquear o pacote antes de acesso.

trans-unit.source: The key [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] of the <c>package</c> to compare in a <see cref="T:System.IO.Packaging.PackWebRequest" />.
trans-unit.target: O [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] chave do <c>pacote</c> a comparar em um <see cref="T:System.IO.Packaging.PackWebRequest" />.

trans-unit.source: The package to add to the store.
trans-unit.target: O pacote a adicionar ao repositório.

trans-unit.source: Adds a <see cref="T:System.IO.Packaging.Package" /> to the store.
trans-unit.target: Adiciona um <see cref="T:System.IO.Packaging.Package" /> ao repositório.

trans-unit.source: `packageUri` defines the package's key URI that is compared when you call <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackWebRequest>.
trans-unit.target: `packageUri` Define a chave do pacote URI que é comparado ao chamar <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackWebRequest>.

trans-unit.source: If the `packageUri` matches the <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart.Uri%2A> for a <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart> in a <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackWebRequest> call, the package defined in the <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageStore> is used to access the requested part.
trans-unit.target: Se o `packageUri` corresponde a <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart.Uri%2A> para um <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart> em uma <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackWebRequest> chamar o pacote foi definido o <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageStore> é usada para acessar a parte solicitada.

trans-unit.source: If the `packageUri` does not match the <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart.Uri%2A> for a <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart> in a <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackWebRequest> call, the package with the specified URI is opened to access the requested part.
trans-unit.target: Se o `packageUri` não coincide com o <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart.Uri%2A> para um <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart> em um <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackWebRequest> chamada, o pacote com o URI especificado é aberta para acessar a parte solicitada.

trans-unit.source: **Security Note** This method demands <xref:System.Security.Permissions.EnvironmentPermission> for all custom <xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package> (non-<xref:System.IO.Packaging.ZipPackage>) types.
trans-unit.target: **Observação de segurança** esse método exige <xref:System.Security.Permissions.EnvironmentPermission> para personalizar todos os <xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package> (não -<xref:System.IO.Packaging.ZipPackage>) tipos.

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to use the <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageStore.AddPackage%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir mostra como usar o método <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageStore.AddPackage%2A>.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="package" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="package" /> é <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="packageUri" /> is an invalid package [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="packageUri" /> é um pacote inválido de [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)].

trans-unit.source: A package with the specified <paramref name="packageUri" /> is already in the store.
trans-unit.target: Um pacote com o <paramref name="packageUri" /> especificado já está no repositório.

trans-unit.source: The [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)] of the package to return.
trans-unit.target: O [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)] do pacote a retornar.

trans-unit.source: Returns the <see cref="T:System.IO.Packaging.Package" /> with a specified [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] from the store.
trans-unit.target: Retorna o <see cref="T:System.IO.Packaging.Package" /> com o [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] especificado do repositório.

trans-unit.source: The package with a specified <paramref name="packageUri" />; or <see langword="null" />, if a package with the specified <paramref name="packageUri" /> is not in the store.
trans-unit.target: O pacote com um <paramref name="packageUri" /> especificado; ou <see langword="null" />, se um pacote com o <paramref name="packageUri" /> especificado não estiver no repositório.

trans-unit.source: `packageUri` is matched to the URIs specified in the <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageStore.AddPackage%2A> method call.
trans-unit.target: `packageUri` está de acordo com os URIs especificado no <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageStore.AddPackage%2A> chamada de método.

trans-unit.source: **Security Note** This method demands <xref:System.Security.Permissions.EnvironmentPermission> for all custom <xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package> (non-<xref:System.IO.Packaging.ZipPackage>) types.
trans-unit.target: **Observação de segurança** esse método exige <xref:System.Security.Permissions.EnvironmentPermission> para personalizar todos os <xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package> (não -<xref:System.IO.Packaging.ZipPackage>) tipos.

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to use the <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageStore.GetPackage%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir mostra como usar o método <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageStore.GetPackage%2A>.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="packageUri" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="packageUri" /> é <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="packageUri" /> is an invalid package [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="packageUri" /> é um pacote inválido de [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)].

trans-unit.source: The [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)] of the package to remove.
trans-unit.target: O [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)] do pacote a remover.

trans-unit.source: Removes the <see cref="T:System.IO.Packaging.Package" /> with a specified [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] from the store.
trans-unit.target: Remove o <see cref="T:System.IO.Packaging.Package" /> com o [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] especificado do repositório.

trans-unit.source: `packageUri` is matched to the URIs specified in the <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageStore.AddPackage%2A> method call.
trans-unit.target: `packageUri` está de acordo com os URIs especificado no <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageStore.AddPackage%2A> chamada de método.

trans-unit.source: **Security Note** This method demands <xref:System.Security.Permissions.EnvironmentPermission> for all custom <xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package> (non-<xref:System.IO.Packaging.ZipPackage>) types.
trans-unit.target: **Observação de segurança** esse método exige <xref:System.Security.Permissions.EnvironmentPermission> para personalizar todos os <xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package> (não -<xref:System.IO.Packaging.ZipPackage>) tipos.

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to use the <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageStore.RemovePackage%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir mostra como usar o método <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageStore.RemovePackage%2A>.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="packageUri" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="packageUri" /> é <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="packageUri" /> is an invalid package [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="packageUri" /> é um pacote inválido de [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)].
